page.title: 15SHOPPING AREA OF S. HARROW
page.content: The lower part of{Northolt Rd. S. {Harrow}is a mixture of shops and houses. The largest shop is the cash and carry warehouse which occupies 12 units.It has three owners. Most shops are however small specialist shops.Those which have{disappeared {include}an{Express Dairy depot,}a wet fish shop,a post office and a builders merchants.New shops are a butchers,a printers and stationers. Shops which have been there longest include a pharmacist 45 yrs. and a mens hairdressers 53 yrs. The southern part of the road has shops, then there are homes on both sides,finally some more shops which continue on the North-West but on the South-East side are more houses.The area serves the needs of the local inhabitants but with{offices {being built}further up the road,will it continue to do so?
